title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Ike Taylor on Big Ben ‘Coddled’ Comments, Trubisky/Pickett QB Battle
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Ike Taylor on Big Ben ‘Coddled’ Comments, Trubisky/Pickett QB Battle
description:
First, Fake Questions, Real Answers (3:00), including if Colin has been too critical of Trey Lance, why he’s defending Kyler Murray’s film study habits, if the Raiders printing cash in Vegas is surprising, why he’s advocating for Draymond Green to get a max extension, and if Charles Barkley will be a hit as a LIV tour commentator.

Then 2-time Super Bowl Champ former Steelers Cornerback Ike Taylor joins Colin to discuss his new role as a scout for his former team (15:00), if Mitchell Trubisky or Kenny Pickett has the edge in the camp QB battle (20:00), if Big Ben is out of line for calling current players 'coddled' (23:00), if the Steelers can compete in the AFC North with the their current QB’s (27:00), what Pittsburgh rookie will make an immediate impact this season (32:00), if Joe Burrow and the Bengals can sustain success after a surprising Super Bowl run (41:00), and why players roll their eyes at Russell Wilson (45:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
